cab.content: Military Secret. 1117 , go jFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 7::m^' ' * 15*/. October 1919.(Received 16th.)13989. 15th October. Alalleson wires 13th October : " Telegram from frontier this morning indicates the Bolslievics were defeated with serious loss after (group or groups omitted) towards Ivizil Arvat."Tehran and Constantinople informed. Repetition of mutilated portion askedfor.
